metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25314 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, there is an integer overflow incopyString.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
